segments.text: Excuse me , I'd like to have these pants I bought here yesterday altered . Here's my receipt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , sir . What would you like done to them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're a little bit too long , so I'd like about half an inch taken off them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , sir . They should be ready for you by tomorrow afternoon .
